Categories.Name: bug
Categories.Label: BUGLABEL
Categories.Description: Issues describing a bug in the Go implementation.

Categories.Name: languageProposal
Categories.Label: LANGPROPLABEL
Categories.Description: Issues describing a requested change to the Go language specification.

Categories.Name: libraryProposal
Categories.Label: LIBPROPLABEL
Categories.Description: Issues describing a requested change to the Go standard library or x/ libraries, but not to a tool

Categories.Name: toolProposal
Categories.Label: TOOLPROPLABEL
Categories.Description: Issues describing a requested change to a Go tool or command-line program.

Categories.Name: implementation
Categories.Label: IMPLABEL
Categories.Description: Issues describing a semantics-preserving change to the Go implementation.

Categories.Name: accessRequest
Categories.Label: access requestLABEL
Categories.Description: Issues requesting builder or gomote access.

Categories.Name: automation
Categories.Label: automationLABEL
Categories.Description: Issues created by gopherbot or watchflakes automation.

Categories.Name: backport
Categories.Label: backportLABEL
Categories.Description: Issues created for requesting a backport of a change to a previous Go version.

Categories.Name: question
Categories.Label: questionLABEL
Categories.Description: Issues that are questions about using Go.

Categories.Name: workingAsIntended
Categories.Label: WorkingAsIntended
Categories.Description: Issues describing something that is working as it is supposed to.

Categories.Name: featureRequest
Categories.Label: FeatureRequestLABEL
Categories.Description: Issues asking for a new feature that does not need a proposal.

Categories.Name: documentation
Categories.Label: Documentation
Categories.Description: Issues describing a change to documentation.

Categories.Name: invalid
Categories.Label: invalidLABEL
Categories.Description: Issues that are empty, incomplete, or spam.
